com.Databaseproject.databaseProject

Class Correlation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Databaseproject.databaseProject.Correlation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManyToMany, OneToMany, OneToOne

    public class Correlation
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represent a correlation of a base. Correlation exists between two tables of the base Correlation can be one-to-one, one-to-many, many-to-many
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      int prKey1() 
      int prKey2() 
      void search()
      searching applied to one-to-one and one-to-many relationships if user searches in table with foreigns, finds row with primary, and compares the respective foreign with primary keys of the other table if user searches in table without foreigns compares the key with foreign fields of the other tables and prints the respective row

        public static void deleteCorrelation(ArrayList<Correlation> correlations)
        Deletes a correlation of the base Deletes foreign key columns table1 doesn't refer to another table anymore Sets counter in right position
        Parameters:
        correlations, - the list of the correlations in the base

      • choice

        public int choice()
        Ask user which is the table that he wants to search for related records according to the choice prints the other table which contains the primary keys returns number of chosen table
        Returns:
        choice int

      • search

        public void search()
        searching applied to one-to-one and one-to-many relationships if user searches in table with foreigns, finds row with primary, and compares the respective foreign with primary keys of the other table if user searches in table without foreigns compares the key with foreign fields of the other tables and prints the respective row

        Parameters:

        table - ArrayList related table
